spdm¶

platform

Linux, Windows

synopsis

spdm module is for all functions related to SPDM message operations for attestation

This module is used for CPLD device attestation validation

Functions

decode ALGORITHM message

class spdm.SPDM_REQUESTER(dict_spdm_msg)¶

Bases: object

class for SPDM requester operation

Parameters

dict_spdm_msg – dictionary of SPDM message

calc()¶

do calculation of the message

set_responder_pubkey(res_pubkey_pem)¶

set responder public key

Parameters

res_pubkey_pem – responder public key in PEM format

show()¶

display requester spdm message

verify_L2()¶

verify MESSAGES.SIGNATURE

verify_M2()¶

verify CHALLENGE_AUTH using responder public key

Before run verification function, please use set_responder_pubkey() method to set the responder public key.
